document_data.mainbody:
he Cloven Ogre was a tavern located in the city of Zhentil Keep during the mid-14 century DR before that citys destruction.
The Cloven Ogre was located in Zhentil Keeps Common Quarter in the north section of the city. It was found along the Street of Delights near Wizards Way.
The graphic sign hanging in front of the Cloven Ogre depicted a beastman having his face split in two by an axe. Both halves of the beastmans face appeared to be in a great amount of pain.
The Cloven Ogre was a popular haunt for young Zhentilar soldiers both on and off duty.
